scripts.comment: TODO: X Check if package is already installed - Resolve dependencies - Warn user about untrusted code - Handle sources other than xml
Adds a package to the package manager without actually importing it
Imports a package to the project without adding it to the package manager

block-definition.comment: Removes a package from the package manager without removing it from the project.
Deletes the components of a package from the current project. Does not remove the package from the package manager.

block.l: function decodeEntities(encodedString) { const parser = new DOMParser(); const dom = parser.parseFromString('<!doctype html><body>' + encodedString, 'text/html'); const decodedString = dom.body.textContent; return decodedString; } spec = decodeEntities(spec); results = (blocks.contents.filter((block) => { if(!block.expression.definition) return false; return ( block.expression.definition.spec === spec && block.expression.category === category //TODO: Add block type ); })); this.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph).stage.threads.processes[0].doDeleteBlock(results[0]);
